name: EliTechWiz AI
description: A powerful WhatsApp AI chatbot using Baileys and OpenAI/Anthropic

AI_PROVIDER.description: AI provider to use (openai or anthropic)

AI_MODEL.description: AI model to use (e.g., gpt-4o, gpt-3.5-turbo, claude-3-sonnet-20240229)

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Your OpenAI API key (get it from https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Your Anthropic API key (get it from https://console.anthropic.com/)

ANTHROPIC_MODEL.description: Anthropic model to use (if AI_PROVIDER is set to anthropic)

USE_PAIRING_CODE.description: Use pairing code instead of QR code (true/false)

PHONE_NUMBER.description: Your phone number with country code (e.g., +1234567890) - optional if using pairing code

SESSION_DIR.description: Directory to store WhatsApp session data

WEBHOOK_URL.description: URL to send webhook events (if ENABLE_WEBHOOK is true)

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'EliTechWiz AI deployed successfully! Check the logs to get your pairing code.'
